refField.label: Type
refField.helptext: Select whether the bank account is the vendor's/employee's/ customer's primary or secondary bank account.

refField.label: Bank Account Number
refField.helptext: Enter the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account number.

refField.label: Bank Account Name
refField.helptext: Enter the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account name.

refField.label: Bank Number
refField.helptext: Enter the code used to identify the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank within the banking industry.

refField.label: Bank Name
refField.helptext: Enter the name of the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank.

refField.label: Branch Number
refField.helptext: Enter the code that identifies the bank branch where the vendor's/employee's/customer's account is maintained.

refField.label: Branch Name
refField.helptext: Enter the name of the bank branch where the vendor's/employee's/customer's bank account is maintained.

refField.label: Account Type
refField.helptext: Select whether your bank account is an ordinary or checking account.
